The host application concept is a best effort attempt to
recognize and integrate with other apps, since many APIs
have been deprecated by Apple. Reach out if an app stops
working, or if you want to add any app to the known list.

KeyboardKit helps you create fully customizable keyboard extensions, using Swift and SwiftUI.
This enum defines keyboard-specific actions, and is also
a namespace for keyboard action-related types.
